findings.message:
ControllerV4.converters (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#935) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- ControllerV4.earn(address,uint256) (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1039-1051)
findings.name: uninitialized-state

findings.message:
Reentrancy in ControllerV4.setStrategy(address,address) (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1025-1037):
	External calls:
	- IStrategy(_current).withdrawAll() (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1034)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- strategies[_token] = _strategy (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1036)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message: ControllerV4.setStrategy(address,address) (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1025-1037) ignores return value by IStrategy(_current).withdrawAll() (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1034)
findings.name: unused-return

findings.message:
ControllerV4.setConvenienceFee(uint256) (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1020-1023) should emit an event for: 
	- convenienceFee = _convenienceFee (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1022)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
ControllerV4.setDevFund(address)._devfund (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#956) lacks a zero-check on :
		- devfund = _devfund (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#958)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
ControllerV4.setStrategy(address,address) (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1025-1037) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(approvedStrategies[_token][_strategy] == true,!approved) (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#1030)
findings.name: boolean-equal

findings.message:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#429-435):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#433)
findings.name: low-level-calls

findings.message:
Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#495-516):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (../..0x6847259b2b3a4c17e7c43c54409810af48ba5210.sol#499)
findings.name: low-level-calls
